trans-unit.source: # mzml2isa-qt #####A PyQt interface for mzml2isa parser.

## MetaboLights Generating a study to upload on MetaboLights requires pieces of information the parser cannot guess from the mzML file alone. To provide more metadata to your final ISA-Tab files, use the
trans-unit.target: ## MetaboLights生成研究以上传到MetaboLights上，需要解析器无法单独从mzML文件中猜测的一些信息。要为最终的ISA-Tab文件提供更多元数据，请使用

trans-unit.source: ## Overview This program is a Graphical User Interface for the [mzml2isa](https://github.com/ISA-tools/mzml2isa) parser. It provides an easy-to-use interface to convert mzML files to an ISA-Tab Study. It was made with Python3 and PyQt5
trans-unit.target: ##概述该程序是[mzml2isa]（https://github.com/ISA-tools/mzml2isa）解析器的图形用户界面。它提供了一个易于使用的界面，可将mzML文件转换为ISA-Tab研究。它是用Python3和PyQt5制成的

trans-unit.source: ## Use Open the GUI with the
### Without PIP Once dependencies installed, clone the mzml2isa-qt repository to a folder with writing permissions:
trans-unit.target: ###不使用PIP安装依赖项后，将mzml2isa-qt存储库克隆到具有写许可权的文件夹中：

trans-unit.source: A PyQt interface for mzml2isa parser.
After that, either run the GUI directly:
Export result to directory of each study
trans-unit.target: 将结果导出到每个研究的目录中

trans-unit.source: Missing information required for MetaboLights upload are at the moment: * Study Factors (sample dependent, must be added to the _study_ file and to the _investigation_ file) * Metabolite Assignment Files * Study Designs
trans-unit.target: MetaboLights上传所需的缺失信息目前为:*研究因素(样本依赖性,必须添加到_study_文件和_investigation_文件)。*研究因素(取决于样本,必须添加到_研究_文件和_调查_文件中)*代谢物分配文件*研究设计。

trans-unit.source: Or install it locally to run with
trans-unit.target: 或者在本地安装它,以便与
bash cd mzml2isa-qt && python3 setup.py install`

trans-unit.source: box. Once parameters are set up, click the
trans-unit.target: 框。参数设置完成后,点击

trans-unit.source: button to open a new window and update details about your study. Still, even with all the required fields filled, the generated ISA needs to be enhanced after the end of the parsing (using for instance [Metabolight pre-packaged ISA Creator](http://www.ebi.ac.uk/metabolights/) to add missing fields).
trans-unit.target: 按钮打开一个新窗口，并更新有关您的研究的详细信息。尽管如此，即使填写了所有必填字段，在分析结束后仍需要增强生成的ISA（例如，使用[Metabolight预先打包的ISA Creator] [ http://www.ebi.ac.uk/metabolights/）添加缺少的字段）。

trans-unit.source: command. To simply parse .mzML files to ISA, select the directory containing your files. With default settings, the program will create the new ISA files in that folder, assuming the folder’s name is the study identifier (_MTBSLxxx_ for instance for MetaboLights studies). This can be changed by unticking the
trans-unit.target: 命令。只需将.mzML文件解析为ISA，请选择包含文件的目录。使用默认设置，程序将在该文件夹中创建新的ISA文件，并假设该文件夹的名称是研究标识符（例如对于MetaboLights研究而言为_MTBSLxxx_）。可以通过取消选中

trans-unit.source: field to main window or change the mzml2isa parser behaviour so that it successfully detects metabolite assignment files and add them to the study file.
trans-unit.target: 字段更改为主窗口或更改mzml2isa解析器的行为，以便它成功检测到代谢物分配文件并将其添加到研究文件中。

trans-unit.source: is present on your system (comes along most of Python install / releases), it can be used to install the program and its dependencies:
trans-unit.target: 在你的系统中存在 (大多数 Python 安装/发布版本中都有),它可以用来安装程序及其依赖关系。
